ai-snp5.15:1.5_0: There is a question that should be answered,
ai-snp5.15:2.1_0: in the true form of wisdom.
ai-snp5.15:2.4_0: Without seeing, there is no calm,
ai-snp5.15:2.5_0: I ask about (his) knowledge, I am a personal knowledge of identity.
ai-snp5.15:3.3_0: the Realised One, after seeing the Realised One.
ai-snp5.15:3.5_0: freed in the ending of craving,
ai-snp5.15:4.2_0: relishing is the fetter of delight;
ai-snp5.15:4.3_0: A mendicant disciple of the Buddha,
ai-snp5.15:4.5_0: this is real knowed for him:
